title: Brentford ´deserved more´ in Aston Villa loss, says Frank
description: Thomas Frank believes Brentford “deserved more than they got” as they suffered a narrow 1-0 defeat to Aston Villa in the Premier League on Saturday. Former Brentford player Ollie Watkins scored the deciding goal for Villa, bending a shot inside the near post via a slight deflection just four minutes into the second half. title: Barcelona game against Osasuna postponed due to death of doctor
description: Barcelona’s LaLiga game against Osasuna on Saturday was postponed following the death of the Catalan club’s doctor, Carles Minarro Garcia. Both teams had announced their line-ups and the players had gone out to warm up at the Lluis Companys Olympic Stadium before it was announced to supporters that the game had been postponed via a […] The post Barcelona game against Osasuna postponed due to death of doctor appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
